update.releaseNotes:
v2.1.0 - Changelog
New --- - Added support for the new Characters: Gold City (Festival), Symboli Rudolf (Festival) and Tosen Jordan. - Added support for the new Support Cards: SSR Stamina Narita Brian, R/SSR Intelligence Curren Chan and SSR Guts Yukino Bijin.
Fixes --- - General bugfixes and optimizations for Ao Haru campaign. - General optimizations for General campaign.
